description:
time: use "2006-01-02 15:04:05.999999999 -0700 MST" as String format

This change shows all the information present
in the Time value (now including fractional seconds)
and also arranges the fields so that, within a single time zone,
string comparison and time comparison agree.

messages.text:
PTAL

Okay, that was obviously wrong.
Stale buffer in editor or Mercurial failure.  Take your pick.
Fixed and uploaded.

i'd like to see a constant for the format used in String so that we can easily parse it.

otherwise LGTM.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=b8fbc6929118 ***

time: use "2006-01-02 15:04:05.999999999 -0700 MST" as String format

This change shows all the information present
in the Time value (now including fractional seconds)
and also arranges the fields so that, within a single time zone,
string comparison and time comparison agree.

R=golang-dev, rogpeppe, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5654078
